div.h1: WCSD Board of Trustees Virtual Public Comments

span.div: If you would like to submit your comments to the Board on a specific agenda item or a general public comment, please send an email to publiccomments@washoeschools.net. Comments will be sent to all members of the Board of Trustees and included as part of the meeting materials.

ul.li: April 28, 2020 Regular Meeting of the Board of Trustees: PUBLIC COMMENTS RECEIVED PRIOR TO MEETING (updated weekdays)
April 14,2020 Regular Meeting of the Board of Trustees: PUBLIC COMMENTS (No comments were received for this meeting)
March 31,2020 Regular Meeting of the Board of Trustees: PUBLIC COMMENTS

a.aria-label: WCSD Continues Distance Learning for Remainder of School Year: District follows directives of Gov. Sisolak and Nevada Department of Education Image

img.alt: WCSD Continues Distance Learning for Remainder of School Year: District follows directives of Gov. Sisolak and Nevada Department of Education

a.span: WCSD Continues Distance Learning for Remainder of School Year: District follows directives of Gov. Sisolak and Nevada Department of Education

p.span: The Washoe County School District will follow the directives issued by Gov. Sisolak and the Nevada Department of Education and will finish the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year by conducting distance learning with its 64,000 students.

a.title: Go to comments for WCSD Continues Distance Learning for Remainder of School Year: District follows directives of Gov. Sisolak and Nevada Department of Education

a.aria-label: WCSD Invites Community to Participate in Virtual Forum Image

img.alt: WCSD Invites Community to Participate in Virtual Forum

a.span: WCSD Invites Community to Participate in Virtual Forum

p.span: At a Virtual Forum scheduled for Tuesday, April 21, Dr. Kristen McNeill will answer questions from the community about the future of the Washoe County School District (WCSD).

a.title: Go to comments for WCSD Invites Community to Participate in Virtual Forum

a.aria-label: WCSD Board of Trustees Schedules Virtual Forum: Interim Superintendent Dr. Kristen McNeill will take questions, discuss future of WCSD Image

img.alt: WCSD Board of Trustees Schedules Virtual Forum: Interim Superintendent Dr. Kristen McNeill will take questions, discuss future of WCSD

a.span: WCSD Board of Trustees Schedules Virtual Forum: Interim Superintendent Dr. Kristen McNeill will take questions, discuss future of WCSD

p.span: As part of its ongoing commitment to public discourse and transparency, the Washoe County School District (WCSD) Board of Trustees has scheduled a Virtual Forum for Tuesday, April 21 from 6 p.m. to 7 p.m.

a.title: Go to comments for WCSD Board of Trustees Schedules Virtual Forum: Interim Superintendent Dr. Kristen McNeill will take questions, discuss future of WCSD

a.aria-label: WCSD Provides Second Phase of Educational Materials As Distance Learning Continues: New locations, times, dates designated for dropping off materials to families Image

img.alt: WCSD Provides Second Phase of Educational Materials As Distance Learning Continues: New locations, times, dates designated for dropping off materials to families

a.span: WCSD Provides Second Phase of Educational Materials As Distance Learning Continues: New locations, times, dates designated for dropping off materials to families

p.span: Due to the extension of school closures ordered by Gov. Sisolak, the Washoe County School District (WCSD) will continue to operate its Distance Learning Program by providing learning materials and contact with teachers and staff through April 30.

a.title: Go to comments for WCSD Provides Second Phase of Educational Materials As Distance Learning Continues: New locations, times, dates designated for dropping off materials to families

span.p: The District prohibits bullying, cyber-bullying, harassment, sexual harassment, discrimination and/or retaliation in any of its educational programs/activities, employment, and employment opportunities. For the District's full Notice of Non-Discrimination statement as well as methods to address questions and concerns please visit our Notice of Non-Discrimination and Web Accessibility page.
span.div: For more information, visit the Civil Rights Compliance Department page.

a.title: Here, you will find information about employment opportunities and how to become part of our team, serving 63,000 students in Washoe County, Nevada. To learn more about WCSD, please watch our welcome
